title: Bug
body: For some reason the music in champ select just keeps looping over and over again

replies.body: We thought this was fixed, please patch up to the latest and let us now if its still happening.

Posting as a reply to so if this will notify... 

> This just happened to me about an hour ago. I was in champ select and when each player had their chance to pick a champion the music began to skip like a "broken record." I am in champ select as we speak right now and it is still happening. As I type this, the music is skipping in the background as each player chooses their champ to ban. As soon as bans were done, it has now started as normal music. Now that players are able to select their champs, it has started skipping again. This problem has not been resolved. The date and time is  10/19/16 - 10:14 PM Central
Thanks for your report, this will be addressed in the next patch hopefully. Thanks for testing the Alpha!
